name: FS Bancorp, Inc.
description: FS Bancorp, Inc. is a bank holding company based in the United States, primarily focused on providing banking and financial services through its wholly-owned subsidiary, 1st Security Bank of Washington. Founded in 1910, the company has a long history of serving its community with a commitment to personalized banking. FSB provides a wide range of financial products, including personal and business loans, deposit accounts, mortgage services, and investment options. The bank is dedicated to fostering community development and economic growth in the regions it serves, offering tailored solutions to meet the needs of its clients. With a focus on customer service and innovative financial solutions, FS Bancorp aims to enhance the banking experience and build lasting relationships with its customers. The company also emphasizes digital banking, offering online and mobile banking services to ensure convenience and accessibility for its customers. As a publicly traded company, FS Bancorp continues to grow and adapt to the evolving financial landscape while maintaining its core values of integrity, service, and community involvement.

seo.meta_title: FS Bancorp, Inc. | Community-Focused Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore FS Bancorp, Inc., a community-focused bank offering a range of financial services and products. Learn about our commitment to customer service and community development.

faq.question: What services does FS Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: FS Bancorp offers a variety of banking services including personal and business loans, deposit accounts, and mortgage services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of FS Bancorp?
faq.answer: Matthew S. Kriete is the CEO of FS Bancorp, Inc.

faq.question: Where is FS Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: FS Bancorp is headquartered in Mountlake Terrace, Washington, USA.
